channel.title: Music – 일 디보(Il Divo)
channel.description: Recent content in 일 디보(Il Divo) on Music

item.title: 일 디보(Il Divo) - Don't Cry for Me Argentina
item.description:
It wont be easy, youll think it strange
When I try to explain how I feel
that I still need your love after
all that Ive done

You wont believe me
All you will see is a girl
you once knew
Although shes dressed up to the nines
At sixes and sevens with you

I had to let it happen, I had to change
Couldnt stay all my life down at heel
Looking out of the window,
staying out of the sun

So I chose freedom
Running around, trying everything new
But nothing impressed me at all
I never expected it to

Dont cry for me Argentina
The truth is I never left you
All through my wild days
My mad existence
I kept my promise
Dont keep your distance

And as for fortune, and as for fame
I never invited them in
Though it seemed to the world
they were all I desired

They are illusions
They are not the solutions
they promised to be
The answer was here all the time
I love you and hope you love me

Dont cry for me Argentina
